articles.description: The Made in India TPHA kit will be one-twentieth the cost of a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test empowering Indian blood banks, hospitals, and laboratories with a cost-effective and accurate solution for large-scale screening of Syphilis patients.
articles.content: New Delhi: Vimek Bioconcept, medical technology company's indigenous Treponema Pallidum haem-agglutination (TPHA) test kit for syphilis diagnosis has received approval from the Central Drugs Standard… [+1370 chars]
